## c1

```{=html}
<!DOCTYPE html>
<style>
  body{
    border: 3px solid blue;

  }
  .c{
    display: flex;
    color: blue;
    font-size: 10px;
    color:#90cdf4;
    align-items: center;
    align-content: center;
    
  }
  .v{
    border: 1px solid blue;
    height: 100px;
    display: flex;
    font-size: 10px;
    color:#90cdf4;
    flex-direction: row; 
    padding: 5px;
    
  }
   .v-item{
    padding: 1px 5px 5px 1px;
    border: 1px solid blue;
    background-color: pink;
    display: flex;
    color: blue;
    font-size: 10px;
    color:#90cdf4;
    align-items: center;
    align-content: center;
    
  }
  #cuadro{
    height: 100% !important; 
    width: 600px !important;
  }

</style>
<div class="c">
    <h2>Buenos días</h2>
</div>
<div class="v" id="cuadro">
<!-- Add a svg area, empty -->

<svg class="v-item" id="V1" height=90 width=90></svg>
<svg class="v-item" id="V2" height=90 width=90></svg>
<svg class="v-item" id="V3" height=90 width=90></svg>
<svg class="v-item" id="V4" height=90 width=90></svg>
<svg class="v-item" id="V5" height=90 width=90></svg>
<svg class="v-item" id="V6" height=90 width=90></svg>
<svg class="v-item" id="V7" height=90 width=90></svg>
<svg class="v-item" id="V8" height=90 width=90></svg>
</div>
<!-- Load d3.js -->
<script src="https://d3js.org/d3.v4.js"></script>
<script>
// Select the svg area
var svg1 = d3.select("#V1")
var svg2 = d3.select("#V2")
var svg3 = d3.select("#V3")
var svg4 = d3.select("#V4")
var svg5 = d3.select("#V5")
var svg6 = d3.select("#V6")
var svg7 = d3.select("#V7")
var svg8 = d3.select("#V8")

// Add 3 dots for 0, 50 and 100%
svg1.append("circle")
  .attr("cx", 35).attr("cy", 40).attr("r", 30).style("fill", "blue");
svg2.append("circle")
  .attr("cx", 35).attr("cy", 40).attr("r", 30).style("fill", "red");
svg3.append("circle")
  .attr("cx", 35).attr("cy", 40).attr("r", 30).style("fill", "green");
svg4.append("circle")
  .attr("cx", 35).attr("cy", 40).attr("r", 30).style("fill", "yellow");
svg5.append("circle")
  .attr("cx", 35).attr("cy", 40).attr("r", 30).style("fill", "orange");
svg6.append("circle")
  .attr("cx", 35).attr("cy", 40).attr("r", 30).style("fill", "black");
svg7.append("circle")
  .attr("cx", 35).attr("cy", 40).attr("r", 30).style("fill", "white");
svg8.append("circle")
  .attr("cx", 35).attr("cy", 40).attr("r", 30).style("fill", "red");
</script>
```
